findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The smart contract may allow an unauthorized user to upgrade the script, potentially leading to malicious behavior.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The function 'Mint' allows creation of a specified number of tokens and adds it to the total supply, which can lead to minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens.

findings.title: Lock
findings.description: The 'lock' finding indicates that a function can be accessed or modified.
